item.title: The Avex Group introduces high-quality hemp fabric as part of the majotae brand
item.description:
Avex Group Holdings, a Japanese entertainment company, has introduced “majotae,” a fabric brand reviving taima-fu, a traditional natural hemp fabric. The photo above features (from left) Shigekazu Takeuchi, Representative Director of Avex Group Holdings; Masato Matsuura, CEO of Avex Group Holdings; Shinichiro Yoshida, natural fabric expert; Genbei Yamaguchi, obi artisan; and Hiroshi Onishi, CEO of Isetan Mitsukoshi Holdings. They were attending the opening reception for the “majotae: The Forgotten Fabric” exhibition at Daikanyama Hillside Forum on October 22, 2014, in Tokyo, Japan...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-avex-group-introduces-high-quality-hemp-fabric-as-part-of-the-majotae-brand/
